product_overview: This project is a backend service for an e-commerce platform, providing robust APIs for managing products and orders with support for CRUD operations and image handling for products.
core_goals: Provide reliable and secure CRUD operations for product management.
Enable efficient order creation and management functionality.
Ensure scalable and maintainable backend architecture using Node.js and MongoDB.
Support image handling for product representation.
key_features: Product API supporting create, read, update, and delete operations for products.
Image handling capability integrated into the Product API for uploading and managing product images.
Order API to facilitate creation, retrieval, and management of customer orders.
RESTful API design using Express framework for easy integration with front-end applications.
user_flow_summary: Admin authenticates and manages products through the Product API, including uploading product images.
Customers place orders via the Order API, which records and manages order data.
System handles saving and retrieving product and order data from MongoDB using Mongoose ORM.
validation_criteria: All CRUD operations on products must function correctly with appropriate image handling.
Orders must be correctly created, retrieved, and updated as per the Order API specifications.
APIs should respond within acceptable time frames and handle error scenarios gracefully.
System must maintain data integrity and consistency in MongoDB.
Codebase should pass all unit and integration tests related to product and order management.

features.name: Product API
features.description: CRUD operations for products, including image handling.
